attributes.action: Make it illegal to charge extra for not paying by Direct Debit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish for it to be made illegal for organisations,companies etc. to charge extra to consumers who do not pay by the method preferred by organisation,company etc.
Example BT charging customers who do not pay by Direct Debit more than people who do.(Ref. BBC Watchdog)
A similar law is soon to be included in The Consumer Protection Bill 2007 in the Republic Of Ireland.
We would like the same protection.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Direct-Debits/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
